briefdescription.para: To update the number of combo streaks and add weight (points) to the mouse
Checks and updates the game mode
Set up when entering normal mode
Set up when entering frenzy mode
Run frenzy mode. Detect taps on mouse and shoot food
Checks to see if any player has won
To be called by the mouse script when the mouse is fed, to determine if food fed matches with the combo sequence
Starts scary cat animation; to be called by the ability controller

Handles game state, such as the player's combo streak, whether or not the player is in frenzy feeding mode, and the number of players in a game. Handles state of combo and player avatar UI as well (?)
